text: Insulation type (batt, board, spray foam, rigid, blown-in) per approved submittal and spec
R-value matches architectural and energy code requirements
Products stored dry and protected from damage
Fire-resistance rating (if required) confirmed for application
Framing cavities clean, dry, and free of debris prior to installation
Mechanical, plumbing, and electrical installations completed and inspected before insulation
Vapor barrier (if applicable) coordinated and verified
Batt insulation fills cavities fully, without compression or gaps
No air gaps, voids, or bridging at corners, edges, or around framing
Rigid board insulation installed flush with substrate; joints taped or staggered as per spec
Around windows/doors fully insulated and fitted
Sprayed foam thickness measured and matches spec
Foam not over-sprayed onto mechanical/electrical components
Off-gassing or curing complete before enclosure
Acoustic insulation installed between party walls, floors, and demising walls as per plans
All penetrations sealed and insulation restored after MEP work
QA/QC and consultant sign-off completed prior to drywall or cladding

id: • CSA A247 / CAN/ULC-S705.2 – Insulation Application Standards
